duties_responsibilities.duty: Gather and evaluate data from multiple sources to identify opportunities for improvement.
Implement audit processes to ensure data issues are identified, tracked, and resolved in a timely manner.
Collaborate with external and internal customers to analyze information needs and functional requirements.
Create and maintain workflows and approval processes based on internal stakeholder requirements.
Develop custom data models and algorithms to apply to data sets.
Assess the effectiveness and accuracy of new data sources and data gathering techniques.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in a related field (Master’s preferred)
